title: Print, "Flower in the Wine Cup (Shuchu no Hana), No. 35", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Flower in the Wine Cup
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 35 / Shuchu no Hana.
description: A large iris, white with magenta tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Flower in the Wine Cup (Shuchu no Hana), No. 35", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-88.
